ygData.subject: RE: Enchanters (OFF TOPIC)
ygData.msgSnippet: That is correct.  The effect is limited to speeded up attack speed. Movement rate is identical.  While it is stackable with alacrity, it s not usually wise for
ygData.messageBody:
That is correct. The effect is limited to speeded up attack speed.
Movement rate is identical. While it is stackable with alacrity, it's not
usually wise for an enchanter to go around trying to be a tank at level 44+
given what most MOBs hit for at that range (and how few HP enchanters have).
Better to illusion:troll and get the increased regen since by the time an
enchanter manages to kill something with physical attacks, he'll probably
have taken enough damage to kill him 10 times over.

-----Original Message-----
From: mstokes [mailto:mstokes@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 9:22 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Enchanters (OFF TOPIC)


From: mstokes <mstokes@...>

I don't believe illusion werewolf has a saw effect. It does however
increase
your attack rate, and is stackable with the Alcracity line of spells
